Intuitive and customizable, Hop helps you quickly jump to your favorite sites.

Sort your links easily with drag and drop. Hop finds icons for each link automatically, but you can link to custom images if you prefer.

For a mouse-free experience, open the popup with Alt+Shift+O and press 1 to open the first link, 2 for the second, etc.
